rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 76, 77, 78} and Must be enrolled in course owned by {50000568})

proh: Students must NOT choose a topic previously competed in PHC5301 or PHC5302
description: SynopsisThis unit has been created in collaboration with the Department of General Practice for students undertaking studies in ONE of the following six topics: Depressive and anxiety disorders in General Practice Issues in General Practice prescribing Chronic disease management Mindfulness-based stress management Dermatology Prevention in General Practice and Primary Care.Students undertaking this unit must choose only one topic.Each topic is equivalent to 6 credit points.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
